column2: Look for more innovations and new knowledge within your guild.
Nothing will happen. (You cannot purchase any more tech points, for now.)
[Root.GetFirstName] used [Root.GetHerHis] influence among [Root.GetHerHis] society to spread MORE new technology and knowledge in [Root.GetHerHis] realm.
[Root.GetFirstName] used [Root.GetHerHis] influence among [Root.GetHerHis] society to spread EVEN MORE new technology and knowledge in [Root.GetHerHis] realm.
